title: Grayson
description: She’s a wildcat in bed and she’s driving me insane!Ever since that first night I can’t get enough of Rahyne Andrews.Her kisses, her body, her moans, drive me crazy. I can’t seem to say no to her.My only problem is, that she doesn’t seem to be interested in more than my body.And I’m not about to have my control taken away from me.She either bends to my will, or I’m walking.Grayson Carter is everything I ever dreamed of and more.He’s built like a rock and knows how to satisfy my every need.But the last thing I want is to have another failed relationship.Especially, when it involves a member of the Hell’s Lovers.I’m the one in control, I’m always in control…So why is it that Grayson Carter is the only man who has ever made me beg for more.Mature Aurdiences Only 18+Explicit language and sexual scenes**************************************************************************************Hellbound Lovers MC SeriesJust an FYI: Although the series is standalone, there is a backstory you should read from the beginning.WOLF (Hellbound Lovers MC #1)http://amzn.to/2xp7Nj6GRAYSON (Hellbound Lovers MC #2)http://amzn.to/2xpzSXPRIGGS (Hellbound Lovers MC #3)http://amzn.to/2srvLEqCAIN (Hellbound Lovers MC #4)http://amzn.to/2gve2rLSETH (Hellbound Lovers MC #5)http://amzn.to/2yYvkIRGrab the series in all formats on my FB page @ http://bit.ly/CrimsonSynStore
author: Crimson Syn
